item.title: Creating an IPFS site
item.description: IPFS TLDR: If your like me and learn from reading code over guides. Here is the repo https://github.com/derage/derage.github.io. You can checkout how to deploy it here TLDR-TLDR: if you dont care about any of the tech and just want to hope right into IPFS, you can take a look at this service I present to you a partially distributed website running on IPFS and using cloudflare to cache the website and DNS.
